mapper.insert: insert into sys_statistic (appkey, path, pv, date, ctime) values (#{appkey}, #{path}, #{pv}, #{date}, #{ctime}) on duplicate key update recode = recode + 1 ;
mapper.select: select sum(pv) from sys_statistic where appkey = #{appkey} and ctime between #{begin} and #{end} ;
select date, sum(pv) as sum from sys_statistic where appkey = #{appkey} and ctime between #{begin} and #{end} group by date;
